text:
This florist showed the best combination of online shopping and bespoke / personalised experience.

I got to find out on one evening that it was someone‚Äôs special birthday and then I decided to send the flower the next day.

I contacted various online florists but did not receive response Nor positive response that they could deliver on the same day as it was very last minute.  For this place, the experience was different from others in the following aspects:

1) Leon called right away
2) I asked for a quicker payment option and he whatsapped me the link instead of asking me to go back to his web site
3) after I paid, I asked Leon whether I could make modification of my order as I had a bit of concern in view of the recipient‚Äôs preference.  He was happily helping with changing bouquet details while making recommendations addressing my concerns
4) all in all; the charges for the modification was very reasonable

In conclusion, I had fantastic experience due to efficient online experience where I could know what I was getting, which got enhanced by bespoke / efficient personalised service provided by Leon.  The flowers bouquet put together was very beautiful and and the delivery service was good too.  Thanks very much Leon!

Thank you so much for being so prompt and responsive.

I texted them at 11pm-12am and I got an immediate response for the delivery of a flower arrangement to the hospital the next morning. The flower arrangement was amazing and I‚Äôm truly thankful for Online Florist.

I‚Äôll definitely recommend this to anyone who is urgently in need of a flower arrangement/ bouquet within the next day.

Thank you once again.
Purchased a bouquet online and it looks great over pictures already- but was amazed by the actual quality and presentation when it arrived! Great job~ Will definitely purchase again in the future.
Love the bouquet I got from Online Florist Singapore. Prices are reasonable, and the flower arrangement is superb. Delivery is quick. Highly recommend!
very fast delivery and very kind ppl. Flowers also very nice. If I buy again flowers then I buy here :) Thank youüòÉüëç
